text: Deborah Anne Mazar Corcos (born August 13, 1964) is an American actress. She is known for playing sharp-tongued women. Her movie credits include in Goodfellas (1990), Little Man Tate (1991), Singles (1992), Beethoven's 2nd (1993), and Lovelace (2013). Her TV appearances include Civil Wars, L.A. Law, Entourage and Younger. Since 2014, she has had a starring role in the Cooking Channel series Extra Virgin with her husband Gabriele Corcos. Mazar was born in Jamaica, Queens, New York City. Her father was born in the Latvian SSR, Soviet Union, to a Jewish family, but raised Roman Catholic. During the 1990s, she dated actor Paul Reubens. She married Italian chef Gabriele Corcos in 2002. The couple have two daughters. In March 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, Mazar tested positive to COVID-19. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Queens Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Television personalities from New York City
title: Debi Mazar
